Nothing to say, it is her choice.I am living in a country where people respect individual choice whether it right or wrong. BUT, as Sri Lankans, we are different from these western cultures due to so called traditional valuable cultural habits. What ever you do, it should be very private. This is a very bad message to the society.The society is expecting better behaviours from Artists even though they always claim that they must have privacy in their lives.But don't forget, all your sustainability is depend on society support and feedback. Good luck for your future and we do hope this will remain long last.
